archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0951
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want to ensure existing Vodafone customers are triggered somehow to differentiate between paying their old vodafone account and their new vodafone account

properties.value: To be clarified, if a customer should see information from old system? or pay to old system? VFNZ will use seperate bank account number for Comarch solution. Payments from dedicated account will be loaded into Comarch system. We will try to match payment based on spefic premises (like customer account number). Payment should be put into suspense when Comarch is not able to match it - for example customer made payment on Comarch bank account number instead of legacy. Note: Comarch is capable to create separate bank account number for each customer.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
